fulltext:
RESUME 
AWS DevOps Engineer 
PERSONAL DETAILS 
● Name 
Vu Van Cuong 
● Sex 
Male 
● Email 
● Phone 
EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND 
● Information Technology – Ports and Telecommunications Institute of Technology, Hanoi. 
● Cumulative GPA: 
8.25/10 
CERTIFICATES 
● Axway API Gateway Certified Associate 
● AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate Level 
● AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional Level 
● AWS Certified SysOps Administrator – Associate Level 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
● Can work independently, have faculty for work in teams and work under pressure well. 
● Team-oriented Cloud engineer with 5 years’ experience in system and network 
administration, managing server infrastructures and datacenter operations across 
multiple platforms (Linux, Windows). 
● Deep experience with many AWS services such as EC2, S3, DynamoDB, RDS, IAM, 
CloudFormation, SQS, SNS, CloudWatch, and other AWS components as Elastic IPs, 
EBS, ELB, Security Groups, . 
● Architected, Designed and Developed the Backup and Archiving, Disaster Recovery in 
AWS Cloud. 
● Hands on experience in development of utilities using Bash scripting and Python 
scripting to automate processes. 
● Good English communication. 
● Soft skills: communication skills, problem-solving skills, time management abilities, 
teamwork skills. 
● Hard working, eager to learn. 
● Hobbies: Traveling, watching movies, listening to music, loving sports, especially 
football. 
Vu Van Cuong’s CV 
Qualifications 
● Programming Languages: Java, Python, Shell script. 
● Programming Tools: Jetbrains IntelliJ, Jetbrains PyCharm, AWS CLI. 
● Database Management Systems: MS SQL Server, MySQL, NoSQL. 
● SVN, PuTTY, WinSCP, Git Bash, NginX, Apache Tomcat. 
● CloudWatch, Nagios, SaltStack, Chef, Jenkins. 
OPERATING SYSTEMS 
● Windows, RHEL, Amazon Linux 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
BA - Kakeibo 
2019/05 - Present 
Objectives 
Develop web application for personal/family financial management likes "Money 
lover". We are responsible for building the application in AWS. 
o Create High level design of application. 
o Create Dockerfile to build application. 
o Setup Jenkins server, Jenkins jobs. 
o Use CI/CD to build, deploy Docker images to ECS clusters for backend. 
Integrating Gitlab with AWS S3 and CodeCommit. 
o Setup static web front end in S3 with source code is written in ReactJS. 
o Centralize application logs to ElasticSearch, analyze logs and setup alert in 
Kibana. 
o Manage and configure CI/CD processes in AWS. 
Customers 
Fujinnotomo, Japan. 
Taken Role 
Solution Architect | DevOps Engineer 
Technology 
EC2, ECS, Lambda, RDS Aurora 
GitLab, CodeCommit, CodeBuild, CodePipeline 
Laravel, PHP, Swagger, React 
CloudFormation 
ElasticSearch, Kibana 
Docker 
Inventory App 
2018/11 - 2019/02 
Objectives 
Connected Car is global service, ECR/ECS versions, Lambda function's specs and 
app versions management is complicated among many AWS regions. Therefore 
we need a tool to manage the information after every releasing app. 
Vu Van Cuong’s CV 
o Build up a DynamoDB table to store data. 
o Create Lambda function to trigger DynamoDB table stream then put data to 
Elasticsearch. 
o Secure Elasticsearch/Kibana authentication by using AWS Cognito. 
o Integrating code to AWS CodePipeline, after every releasing code the 
information of ECR/ECS, Lambda function, app version will be updated to 
a DynamoDB table. Then user can access to Kibana endpoint to check the 
information. 
Customers 
Honda, Japan. 
Taken Role 
Solution Architect | DevOps Engineer  
Technology 
ECR, ECS 
Lambda 
DynamoDB, AWS ElasticSearch, AWS Cognito 
CloudFormation 
Docker 
My Honda – Connected Car 
2018/07 - 2019/04 
Objectives 
Honda has various IoT systems for their cars. We are responsible for 
providing/provision AWS resources for collecting and processing data of IoT 
devices. 
o Use CI/CD (CodePipeline, CodeCommit, CodeBuild, S3) to provisioning 
AWS resources such as EC2 instances, ALB, SSM Parameters, AWS 
Batch, Lambda functions, RDS, ECR, ECS... in multiple AWS regions. 
o Use CI/CD to build, deploy Docker images to ECS clusters (EC2 or 
Fargate). 
o Integrating Aqua MicroScanner to CI/CD process for Docker image 
vulnerability scanning. 
o Create High level design and build up many applications on Cloud. 
o Manage and configure CI/CD processes on AWS. 
Customers 
Honda, Japan. 
Taken Role 
Solution Architect | DevOps Engineer  
Technology 
EC2, ECS 
CodePipeline, CodeCommit, CodeBuild 
Batch, Lambda 
CloudWatch, CloudFormation, CloudTrail, SNS 
Aqua MicroScanner 
Docker 
Essent 
2015/05 - 2018/05 
Projects 
AWS Manage Services 
Vu Van Cuong’s CV 
Objectives 
Essent is the largest energy company in Netherlands. They have many application 
vendors as well as applications running on multiple Cloud environments and on 
premise. Essent Infrastructure team is responsible to provide infrastructure service 
to many teams/vendors inside and outside Essent. 
o Solving technical incidents/requests regarding to AWS Cloud and 
application. 
o Manage and configure web applications. 
o Configure Squid proxy to whitelist urls. 
o Create High level design, build up and migrate many applications on 
Cloud: SDS, CRS, GDS, WUS, SonarQube 
o Provision AWS resources: EC2, RDS, S3 buckets, IAM accounts, 
DynamoDB tables. 
o Manage many RDS MySQL instances that stores energy data as a DBA: 
insert, delete data, copy data between multiple RDS instances, manage 
accounts in databases. 
o Manage SDS application that processes and stores energy data with many 
technologies: ELB, Auto Scaling Groups for EC2 instances, SQS, Redis, 
DynamoDB. Setup Data pipeline for backing up DynamoDB tables daily. 
o Use SaltStack to configure, manage EC2 servers in Auto Scaling Groups. 
o Write Python scripts to get data from DynamoDB tables as customer’s 
request. 
o Configure CloudFront with S3 bucket and Route53 for static content of 
application. 
o Monitor system 24x7, using CloudWatch combine with SNS to send 
notifications of system. Setup Nagios to monitor multiple server’s metrics: 
memory, cpu, disk space, services… 
Customers 
Essent, Netherlands. 
Team size 
11 people 
Taken Role 
Solution Architect | Technical Support Engineer 
Technology 
EC2 
RDS, DynamoDB, ElastiCache, Data Pipeline 
S3 
CloudWatch, CloudFormation, CloudTrail 
SQS, SNS 
Route53 
Trusted Advisor 
Mytour 
2017/01 – 2018/01 
Projects 
Mytour 
Objectives 
Manage web applications on AWS that includes web servers, databases for 
multiple environments. 
Vu Van Cuong’s CV 
o Manage IAM accounts: create, delete, grant permissions… 
o Manage VPN accounts with security policy for developers of Mytour 
o Manage web servers: configure apache, write scripts to stop/start the 
servers as schedule based on demand. Provision new servers as 
customer’s requirement. 
o Manage Route53 records, AWS S3 buckets, RDS, use CloudFront to 
host static files. 
o Apply multi AZ for production DB to enhance availability and durability, 
use Read Replica to enhance DB performance. 
o Backup the databases manually/automatically. 
o Copy tables, database among environments. 
o Monitor system 24x7, using CloudWatch combine with SNS to send 
notifications of system. 
Customers 
Mytour, Vietnam 
Team size 
8 people 
Taken Role 
Solution Architect | Technical Support Engineer 
Technology 
EC2 
CloudWatch, SNS 
CloudFormation 
RDS MySQL 
S3 
Pavaso 
2016/01 – 2017/07 
Projects 
Pavaso 
Objectives 
Manage services for applications that runs in Windows platform, security 
managements. 
o Manage AWS IAM accounts. 
o Manage EC2 instances with Windows Server 2012 OS, IIS for web 
servers, ELB. Backup EC2 by creating AMI. 
o Create Python scripts to check free disk space and send notifications 
for servers. 
o Manage RDS MS SQL databases, copy data between environments by 
using RDS MS SQL native backup and restore. Create Python scripts 
for checking free space of database. 
o Manage Cloud HSM. 
o Monitor system 24x7, using CloudWatch combine with SNS to send 
notifications of system. 
Customers 
Pavaso, USA 
Vu Van Cuong’s CV 
Team size 
8 people 
Taken Role 
Solution Architect | Technical Support Engineer 
Technology 
EC2 
CloudWatch, SNS 
CloudFormation 
S3, RDS MS SQL 
BI Reports 
2014/11 – 2015/05 
Projects 
BI Reports 
Objectives 
Using Birst framework to create business intelligent reports with data source is 
retrieved from Salesforce. Write queries likes SQL statement in the reports. 
Migrate the reports from one framework to another one. 
Also use Microsoft Power BI to build reports. 
Customers 
CorSource, USA. 
Team size 
5 people 
Taken Role 
Developer 
Technology 
Birst framework, MS PowerBI 
SQL statements, JSON 
Vu Van Cuong’s CV
